title: Play-By-Play Caster looking for work
body:
The title itself sums up the purpose of this post. I've been getting into casting over the past year specifically and have had several successful play-by-play casts on broadcasts. However, i'm looking to get most casts as where i used to 'work' for haven't come up with any new casts in many months now. I don't mind if its for a small event, i'm just looking to get more experience as a caster on a broadcast and looking to improve my skills through practice. I know that, as of writing this, i haven't casted in some time and i am wanting to return to my previous level and improve upon it. 
My experience with casting has been casting the OOL in split 1 of 2017, as well as the Internation-Eports Federation 2017 Qualifiers. My casting style, as a play-by-play, is excitable and passionate, always hyping up the fights for the best viewer experience (And also because i get really into big teamfights and can't help myself).
I'm happy to provide evidence of my previous casts, and if anyone is interested. Either comment below or add me on league (League Ign is Eatos). 
Cheers
-Eatos

replies.body:
If you haven't already, I would suggest becoming active on twitter and interacting with fellow oceanic esports fans. 
There is a pretty big community so you can network, as well as regular opportunities for things like casting advertised there before anywhere else. 

Follow the accounts of OPL/OCS players, ORG owners, Sumsoc, Letsplaylive, etc

Have you tried contacting Summoner's Society OCE? If you get into the Facebook, you can either make a post asking or join the Discord (preferable) and contact *LostStarDust* from there and message her about this. In fact, here is the Discord link: https://discord.gg/p2QkBzH

They shoutcast tournaments every Monday, and are planning on increasing it to another day (which they might with more shoutcasters).

I hope this helps :D

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I am part of Summoners Society and i did apply to become a shoutcaster for their Monday events about two months ago when they put out a notice looking for casters. I spoke with the person who i believe is LostStarDust via facebook. However, after a short conversation and expressing my interest, i never got a reply and i know that they did get casters and i simply didn't get a message telling me i didn't get the slot.

But thank you very much for putting forward the offer, and i might message her again just to try and get in, but i feel that might come off as pestering which i dislike doing as a matter of principle. 
Thanks :) 
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
